https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nPHkGLD79M6p6qpOLw5LffisUCW.jpg A man takes his dog for an early morning walk around the streets and alleyways of a Parisian suburb. On returning home, he decides instead to continue to a secluded hill to sit with his dog and think. A Sunday Morning
